turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Hi assistant, can you get a starbucks order ready for me?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Certainly, what starbucks are you picking up from?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I'll be going by the Starbucks on Richmond road in Lexington Kentucky.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Got it. I just wanted to warn you that location closes at 11PM and it is currently 10:37. Is this okay?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: That's more than fine. I'm 5 minutes away now.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Excellent, so what were you wanting to put on that order?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Could you get a chestnut praline latte started please?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Of course, what size would you like that?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Venti, please.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: One venti chestnut praline latte coming up! What kind of milk do you want in that?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: 2% will be fine, thanks.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Got it, would you like to add any extra syrups or whipped cream to that?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Ooh yes. Add caramel syrup please.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Can do. do you want that hot or iced?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Iced, please!

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Okay, so thats a iced venti chestnut praline latte with 2% milk and caramel syrup. Is that right?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yep! Sounds good to me.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Sounds good, did you want to add anything else to this order?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: No thank you.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Okay, I've put that order in for you now. It should be ready at Richmond Road in 10 minutes. I'm sending a receipt to your mobile device through text now. Is there anything else I can do for you today?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: That's all, thank you!

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: No problem, have a good night.
